basics.name: Tyler Benson
basics.label: Computer Science student
basics.description: Hey, I'm Tyler Benson, a Computer Science student at Princeton passionate about data and AI. Talk soon!
basics.about: I'm passionate about data science, building random webapps, and climbing! While I'm not coding or climbing I enjoy playing the double bass, surfing, singing, and sleeping

wip-projects.title: SpaceTiger
wip-projects.description: Yelp for study spots on college campuses. A three-tiered entire semester project where I acted as team lead of our 5 engineers. My first experience as a Project Manager.

projects.title: Habitat Sartorial
projects.description: The commerce and blog website for Habiat Sartorial. This project is built with React frontend and NodeJS backend with firebase hosting and database technologies. This my biggest project in terms of hours spent.

projects.title: Predicting Rates of Homelessness
projects.description: What factors best predict rates of homelessness in U.S. communities? - modern data science analysis into the relationship of market and climate factors to rates of homelessness.

projects.title: Chandlers Fav Album
projects.description: A webapp to photoshop your favorite album into Chandler's arms. It is built with React frontend, flask serverless functions for backend, and hosted with Vercel.

projects.title: Lonely Raids
projects.description: This webapp connects you and your friends to a random Twitch streamer currently streaming to zero viewers. It is built with raw HTML + jQuery frontend and firebase backend. This was one of my first substantial projects and so the story of trial and error here is long lol.

projects.title: Teagan Lamp
projects.description: This single page webapp allows you to control my friend Teagan's desk lamp at the click of a button. This was built with HTML + jQuery frontend and flask python backend.

projects.title: Leilanibender.com
projects.description: This project is a simple static portfolio website made in React.

points.content: Worked closely with large businesses to use IBM technology to solve their specific needs.
Designed, built, and demoed an AI Customer Service Assistant to pitch to a large energy provider.
Applied machine learning such as projected bill pricing, customer tone analysis, and predicted lengths of current power outages.
Worked full-time during my gap year from Princeton 2020-21. Now at 10 hours a week, I garner insights from product usage data.
Created a machine learning model which is now being used 400+ times a day by four major hospitals to inform physicians of a patients likelihood of admission to the ICU from early triage data.
Built the public-facing website at curbsidehealth.com.
Designed, built, and deployed the fully-functioning, modern commerce website to house our philosophy, showcase donors, and allow for zero-pain-point ordering of our fashion.
Applied SEO and HCI analytics across seven social media channels to drive growth and customer/donor communication.
Now at ~5 hours a week, I update the website with new content and continue my analytical web development.
Set up multiple web scraping scripts to automate searching for potential clients in France, Spain and Portugal.
Seeded our database with 1500+ clients to reach out to.
Developed SeqSpawner, an object-oriented Python library for simulating biological sequences.
Studied Bayesian statistical models to generate the simulatory testing suite.
Developed a urine test for Preeclampsia through analysis of large data sets of protein concentrations.
Expanded and applied my knowledge of Python to make a tangible impact. :P.
This was the first time I ever coded anything. My first steps.
I was awarded Mr. Zionsville after performing Thunderstruck on the Double Bass and singing Never Gonna Give You Up by Rick Astley.
Mr. Z is a male beauty pageant to raise money for Prom.
My friends and I wanted to see how well we would do with 0 preparation.

hobbies.description: I grew up playing classical upright bass

points.content: Princeton University Orchestra 2019 - 2021.
Was selected as Interlochen soloist winner 2015 and 2016 among 20 high achieving Double Bass players.
Principal Bassist of the Indianapolis Youth Orchestra 2015 - 2019.
Principal Bassist of the competitive Side-by-Side program 2019.
Princeton's Shere Khan acapella group 2019 - 2021
Member of Zionsville Community High School's competitive show choir, Royalaires
I sing bass :)

hobbies.description: I am rly into it recently

points.content: Member of the Princeton University Climbing Team
